column4: Whats the problem with my sources.list? I cannot install azureus, w32codecs, java? http://pastebin.com/368042
they were taken out of hoary-extras
dammit. how can i install those than?
azureus, you can use the pack from their website; w32codecs isn't really available, and java: either https://wiki.ubuntu.com/JavaPackageBuildNewVersions or upgrade to breezy
could you please tell me how to install azureus because I have no idea. I downloaded Azureus_2.3.0.4_linux.GTK.tar.bz2 is this right?  btw. Java installation system worked and thanks for you.
you just have to open a file there; don't recall the exact name
I installed azureus and it worked. But it didn't make any shotcuts. Before when apt-get worked it make a shortcut in gnome -> internet -> azureus
you can make them; use smeg or whatever =)
how can i make a script named 'azureus'; ex. "./azureus" because i cannot make shortcut that i have to use terminal and go to azureus directory and use ./azureus?
